type BindingList<'T> = class inherit Collection<'T> interface IBindingList interface ICancelAddNew interface IRaiseItemChangedEvents interface IList interface ICollection interface IEnumerable

span.span: The type of elements in the list.

summary.span: 提供支援資料繫結的泛型集合。

span.span: Provides a generic collection that supports data binding.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別可用來當做基底類別建立雙向資料繫結機制。The class can be used as a base class to create a two-way data-binding mechanism. 提供的具象的一般實作介面。 provides a concrete, generic implementation of the interface. 這是實作完整的替代介面，由於微妙的互動之間很難， ，和相關聯。This is an alternative to implementing the complete interface, which can be difficult because of the subtle interaction between , , and the associated . 不過，典型方案程式設計人員會使用這個類別提供資料繫結功能，例如，而不是直接使用。However, the typical solutions programmer will use a class that provides data binding functionality, such as , instead of directly using . 支援透過可延伸原廠建立的執行個體方法。 supports factory-created instances through the extensible method. (相同類型的擴充性中也有其他類別，例如) 此外，因為這個類別會實作介面，它可讓交易的認可或回復新的項目，透過並方法。(This same type of extensibility is also found in other classes, such as ) In addition, since this class implements the interface, it enables transactional commits or rollbacks of the new item through the and methods. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何繫結至包含商務物件的元件。The following code example demonstrates binding to a component containing a business object. 這是完整的範例，其中包含`Main`方法。This is a complete example that contains a `Main` method. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此來建立由備份`list`，以確保變更`list`會反映在。Use this to create a that is backed by `list`, which ensures that changes to `list` are reflected in the . 下表顯示 類別執行個體的初始屬性值。The following table shows initial property values for an instance of class. |屬性Property|初始值Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| ||`true`| ||`true` 如果清單型別有預設建構函式否則， `false`。`true` if the list type has a default constructor; otherwise, `false`.| ||`true`| ||`true`|

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event AddingNew As AddingNewEventHandler

summary.span: 在項目加入至清單之前發生。

span.span: Occurs before an item is added to the list.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所表示之集合中加入新的物件之前，就會發生事件屬性。The event occurs before a new object is added to the collection represented by the property. 之後會引發這個事件呼叫方法時，之前是建立新的項目，並將其加入內部清單。This event is raised after the method is called, but before the new item is created and added to the internal list. 藉由處理這個事件，程式設計人員可以提供自訂的項目建立及插入行為，而不會強制衍生自類別。By handling this event, the programmer can provide custom item creation and insertion behavior without being forced to derive from the class. 如需有關如何提供自訂的新項目功能的詳細資訊，請參閱方法。For more information about supplying custom new item functionality, see the method. 如需有關如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何處理事件。The following code example demonstrates how to handle the event. 完整的範例，請參閱類別概觀主題。For the complete example, see the class overview topic. [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.BindingListOfTExample#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.BindingListOfTExample/CS/Form1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.BindingListOfTExample#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.BindingListOfTExample/VB/Form1.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance !T AddNew() cil managed

summary.span: 將新項目加入至集合中。

span.span: Adds a new item to the collection.
The item added to the list.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會將新的項目所表示之集合加入屬性。The method adds a new item to the collection represented by the property. 若要加入新項目，請使用下列邏輯：To add a new item, the following logic is used: 1. 自動引發事件。The event is automatically raised. 可以以程式設計方式處理此事件，以建構新的自訂項目。This event can be programmatically handled to construct a new custom item. 這藉由設定來完成的事件處理常式屬性參數，以新的項目。This is accomplished in the event handler by setting the property of the parameter to the new item. 否則，透過其公用預設建構函式會自動建立新的項目。Otherwise, the new item is automatically created through its public default constructor. 2. 追蹤的新項目位置，但它不會加入至清單直到符合下列條件之一為止：The position of the new item is tracked, but it is not added to the list until one of the following conditions are met: - 項目明確認可呼叫。The item is explicitly committed by a call to . - 項目會隱含地認可的變更清單，例如插入或移除的項目內容的一些其他作業。The item is implicitly committed by some other operation that changed the contents of the list, such as an insertion or removal of an item. 相反地，呼叫認可項目之前的方法會導致捨棄新的項目。In contrast, calling the method before the item is committed will cause the new item to be discarded. 這個方法會引發認可新的項目時的事件。This method raises the event when the new item is committed. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會示範如何使用 方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method. 。. 完整的範例，請參閱類別概觀主題。For the complete example, see the class overview topic. [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.BindingListOfTExample#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.BindingListOfTExample/CS/Form1.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.BindingListOfTExample#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.BindingListOfTExample/VB/Form1.vb#4)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性通常由其他元件用來判斷是否允許建立新的項目。The property is typically used by other components to determine if the creation of new items is allowed. 預設值為`true`清單中包含的類型是否具有預設建構函式或處理事件。 defaults to `true` if the type contained in the list has a default constructor or the event is handled. 如果未處理事件，或清單類型沒有預設建構函式，然後預設為`false`。If the event is not handled or the list type does not have a default constructor, then defaults to `false`. 如果已經明確設定，設定的值將永遠供繫結的物件來判斷是否可以加入新項目清單。If is explicitly set, the set value will always be used by bound objects to determine if new items can be added to the list. 是否是`true`或是`false`，可以加入新項目，藉由明確呼叫如果清單型別有預設建構函式或處理事件。Whether is `true` or `false`, new items can be added by explicitly calling if the list type has a default constructor or the event is handled. 此外，設定會導致型別的事件發生。In addition, setting causes a event of type to occur. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to set the property. 完整的範例，請參閱類別概觀主題。For the complete example, see the class overview topic. remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別未提供的基底實作排序，因此一律會擲回預設。The class does not provide a base implementation of sorting, so always throws a by default. 若要啟用排序，衍生自並執行下列工作：To enable sorting, derive from and perform the following tasks: - 覆寫並實作排序，引發事件排序時就會完成。Override and implement sorting, raising the event when sorting is complete. - 覆寫並實作排序移除。Override and implement sort removal. - 覆寫並設定至`true`。Override and set to `true`. 此外，您可能想要實作補充和排序屬性。In addition, you may want to implement the supplemental and sorting properties.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別未提供的基底實作排序，因此一律會傳回`false`預設。The class does not provide a base implementation of sorting, so always returns `false` by default. 類別未提供排序的基底實作。The class does not provide a base implementation of sorting. 若要啟用排序，衍生的類別和：To enable sorting, derive a class from and: - 覆寫並實作排序引發事件排序時就會完成。Override and implement sorting raising the event when sorting is complete. - 覆寫並實作排序移除。Override and implement sort removal. - 覆寫並設定至`true`。Override and set to `true`. 此外，您可能想要實作補充和s 排序屬性。In addition, you may want to implement the supplemental and s sorting properties.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件和方法允許自訂建立項目新增至清單。The event and the method allow custom-created items to be added to the list. 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

MemberSignature.Value: ReadOnly Property RaisesItemChangedEvents As Boolean Implements IRaiseItemChangedEvents.RaisesItemChangedEvents

summary.span: 取得值，指出項目屬性值變更是否會引發 型別的 事件。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether item property value changes raise events of type .

summary.span: 在衍生類別中不可覆寫這個成員。

span.span: This member cannot be overridden in a derived class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 檢查清單型別，以查看是否實作介面，以指出它會引發事件的個別清單項目上的屬性值變更時。 checks the list type to see if it implements the interface to indicate that it raises events of when property values are changed on individual list items. 在衍生類別中不可覆寫這個成員。This member cannot be overridden in a derived class.
